thread.section_title: Ink Station Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ink Station | inkstation.com.au
thread.title: David WELLINGS BOOTH
thread.title_full: Ink Station reviewed by David WELLINGS BOOTH

author: David WELLINGS BOOTH
title: David WELLINGS BOOTH
text:
I am happy with the service I receive from you. The only problem I have is when Austpost take ~ 3 days to deliver. The other problem I have is if I happen not to be home when the Package is being delivered the person making the delivery takes the package back to his/her depot. This means I have to catch a bus into town the next day to collect the package. Very inconvenient when I am almost 78 yrs old.
Regards
David WELLINGS BOOTH.
